title: Idea for game mode rotation
body:
With the rotating game modes in confirmed I thought I would come up with a NEW game mode to add.

I would call it Domination... No wait, Dominion. Yea Dominion sounds cool.

It could use the existing Ascention map. This would save a lot of time and effort in creating a new game mode.

Essentially this new Dominion game mode would be a sort of King-of-the-hill type battle arena where 2 teams of 5 fight to control 5 capture nodes around the map.
Holding capture points would deal damage to the enemies big nexus crystal and when it reaches 0 you have beat them.

So do you think? Could this be a viable new game mode to add to the rotation? I mean more than half of the assets are already there...

replies.body:
They have already said it's possible for them to add dominion into the rotating queue, same as any other mode they've released.

Sorry your attempt for upvotes didn't work
I wasn't trying to get upvotes. Just trying to offend people with my heretical comments.
I did not know that.  Hope they do not though.  It would be like a dead weekend.  Especially if it fell anywhere near the Ascension weekend.

No, and here is why: 

 Ascension is the same thing, but better.  Instead of 5 "nodes", you have the 3 crystals that you can grab for a set amount of points.  But wait!  There is more to ascension!  You also have {{champion:101}} buff.  There was not any buff like that in Dominion.  On top of that, your kills count as points for "Nexus damage".

You are asking for a lame version of Ascension, where your kills mean next to nothing(just gold advantage), and you have no objective diversity.  Its not going to happen.
